page.title: 06PACKINGTON CE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The primary school was founded in 1895 by the Countess of Louden.It has always remained asmall rural school though at the moment there are about 85 children on roll.The facilities include 3 classrooms in the main building and a mobile classroom.There is no schoolhall. There is a wide range of modern equipment such as a kiln, a computer, calculators and T.V. The staff consists of Head and 3 full time teachers plus a part time teacher.The non-teaching staff consists of school clerical assistant,ancilliary helper, caretaker,and two dining assistants.
